## Procedures.mutateCallers() function

When a procedure definition changes its parameters, find and edit all its callers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function mutateCallers(defBlock: Block): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  defBlock | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | Procedure definition block. |

**Returns:**

void
